title: Motion.ai fb chat bot REST API & Stripe integration
snippet: Looking for a developer who has experience in REST API & Stripe integrations. I need a working bot which can take orders & payments on fb messenger. I have the motion.ai workflow ready and my bot is currently live. It just needs some simple tweaks using webhooks and maybe some coding. Integration docs are available on motion.ai website. I also need a solution to save and use the extracted customer details like name, email, phone nos etc from the chat.
